title: USG Settlement Record
description: Schema for a single settlement record logged by the USG clearinghouse.

txn_id.description: Unique transaction identifier within the clearinghouse.

event_id.description: Identifier of the event associated with this transaction.

amount_usd.description: Total settlement amount in USD for this transaction.

split.description: Monetary allocation across stakeholders, expressed in USD.

timestamp.description: UTC timestamp for when the settlement was recorded.

ledger_hash.description: Opaque hash representing this entry in the append-only ledger.
